entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Welland
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:08 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 1 with temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Low minus 1 with temperature rising to zero by morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3 with temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers in the morning. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 70 near noon then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High plus 3 with temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of snow before morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of snow. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of snow. High zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of freezing rain or snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain or snow. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. High plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Windy. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
